page.title: 07Creca Village Hall's Future
page.content: The future of the hall is uncertain as the W.I. are the only organisation using it. The Carpet Bowlers and Whist Players prefer to go elsewhere. The Hall Committee have called several public meetings which were poorly attended. If the W.I. cannot meet the expense of the Insurance and Rates, the Hall will revert to the Trustees and cease to be a Village Hall. The difficulties of maintaining Village Halls is a problem as it depends on the needs of the village community and many halls are no longer a viable proposition. Half the village would regret the loss od the Hall but the attractions outside the village outweigh this.
